Exclusive FundingPips Trading Offer

FundingPips, based in the United Arab Emirates and established in August 2022, is a CFD firm providing a two-step evaluation program. Account sizes range from $5,000 to $100,000. Tradable instruments include cryptocurrencies, forex currency pairs, indices and commodities; leverage is provided up to 1:100. Review scores for the firm are high, at 4.7/5 from 10,744 reviews. This summary provides an overview of FundingPips\u2019 service offering and evaluation structure. checked by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.

youtube_metadata.title: FundingPips Promo Code: 20% OFF Discount
youtube_metadata.description: Get funded with FundingPips using our exclusive discount code. certified for the current trading season.
